name: wiki_hades
instruction: Hallucination is when a language model presents false information as if it were true. Classify whether the target span (wrapped with ===) in the text is hallucinated or not hallucinated.
instruction_2: Hallucination occurs when a language model generates false information that appears to be true. Decide if the target span (marked with ===) in the text is not hallucinated or hallucinated.
